description:
Want to take your Logo design to the next level??
Then this course is for you!

During this course I will show you how to create 3D Objects in this case text from a curve generated from Illustrator, We will also look at generating 3D text within Maya itself.
Finally I will show you how to add materials, set up a basic three point light system and render out using Mental ray, this course on Creating Logos - A Maya Online Course Custom Logo and Text is a must!

So Exactly what do I learn from this course?

  • Import EPS curves from Illustrator into maya and generate Geometry we can work with from it
  • Set up a scene, and keep it clean
  • Install Mental ray for rendering
  • Add material types both Maya and Mental ray materials
  • Set up a basic lighting set up
  • Create a basic animation and out put the sequence to be composited in After effects
  • Generat text directly inside of Maya
  • Extrude, add edge loops, merge vertexes and a host of other things

This course is very thorough and cover quite a lot for such a short course giving you the info fast!

Take the Creating Logos - A Maya Online Course Custom Logo and Text course today!

I hope you enjoy this course and get a lot out of it
All the best
The Monster-Training Team
title: Creating Logos - A Maya Online Course Custom Logo and Text
